function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Integration of high resolution risk mapping with CDRs","Impact":"Inadequate targeting of elimination activities and inefficient use of resources","Mitigation":"Ensure system flexibility to allow for targeted deployment of resources based on risk mapping and mobility patterns","Technologies":"Geospatial mapping technology, mobile data collection tools","People":"Health officials, disease control experts","Owner":"Health ministries, disease control organizations"},{"Description":"Over-reliance on mass drug administration (MDA) or mass screen and treat (MSAT) approach","Impact":"Inefficient reduction of receptivity in high transmission risk sinks","Mitigation":"Promote targeted approaches such as encouraging bed net use in high transmission risk sinks","Technologies":"Mobile health apps, community health workers","People":"Community members in high transmission risk sinks","Owner":"Local health authorities, community health organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of post-elimination surveillance targeting","Impact":"Ineffective surveillance and management of areas receptive to disease transmission","Mitigation":"Utilize the framework to target surveillance in climatically, ecologically, and demographically receptive areas connected by human movement","Technologies":"Geospatial surveillance tools, data analytics platforms","People":"Public health agencies, surveillance teams","Owner":"National public health agencies, research institutions"}]}
